title: üí´ Day 1: Using Ethereum Mainnet
description: Get started with Ethereum by setting up a wallet and making your first transaction!

title: ‚ö° Day 2: Using L2s
description: Experience the speed and cost savings of Ethereum Layer 2 solutions!

title: üéÆ Day 3: Gaming & NFTs
description: Dive into blockchain gaming and explore the world of digital collectibles!

title: üåê Day 4: DAOs
description: Experience decentralized governance by participating in DAOs and creating your own!

tasks.title: Members of the group
tasks.description: Write the names/aliases of the EFers you worked with for these challenges!

tasks.title: Challenge 1: Offchain governance on Discourse
tasks.description: Share a link of your contribution and a brief comment on your experience.

tasks.title: [Optional] Challenge 1: Offchain governance on Discourse
tasks.description: Include screenshots of your contribution.

tasks.title: Challenge 2: (Re-)Delegate your DAO tokens
tasks.description: Share a link of your contribution and a brief comment on your experience.

tasks.title: [Optional] Challenge 2: (Re-)Delegate your DAO tokens
tasks.description: Include screenshots of your contribution.

tasks.title: Challenge 3a: Create a Snapshot space
tasks.description: Share a link to the Snapshot space you created and a brief comment on your thought process when choosing this particular voting strategy.

tasks.title: [Bonus] Challenge 3a: Create a Snapshot space
tasks.description: Share a screenshot attesting your onchain execution (e.g., the SafeSnap plugin setup finalized).

tasks.title: Challenge 3b: Explore a DAO suite
tasks.description: Post a link to each of your newly created DAOs.

tasks.title: [Optional] Challenge 3b: Explore a DAO suite
tasks.description: Share a brief comment about your experience.

tasks.title: Challenge 3c: Summon a Moloch DAO
tasks.description: Share a link of your contribution and a brief comment on your experience.

tasks.title: [Optional] Challenge 3c: Summon a Moloch DAO
tasks.description: Include screenshots of your contribution.

tasks.title: [Optional / Bragging Rights] Challenge 3d: Deploy a Governor contract
tasks.description: Share a link of your contribution and a brief comment on your experience.

tasks.title: [Optional / Bragging Rights] Challenge 3d: Deploy a Governor contract
tasks.description: Include screenshots of your contribution.

tasks.title: Challenge 4: DAOs, DINOs and everything in between
tasks.description: Share your responses to a) and b).

tasks.title: Challenge 5: Upgrade your DAO to multiplayer
tasks.description: Share a link of your contribution and a brief comment on your experience. Mention unique identifiers of all other participants to confirm they are part of your DAO.

tasks.title: [Optional] Challenge 5: Upgrade your DAO to multiplayer
tasks.description: Include screenshots.

tasks.title: [Optional] Help improve the state of DAOs
tasks.description: Are you interested further discussing the state of DAOs? We'll keep a list and might get back to you for further events or projects.
